text:
なぜ体を
持ち去り
頭を
残した?
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 33.83%;top: 5.18%;width: 11.58%;height: 9.05%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
頭を
分離できる
悪魔は
デュラハン
だけだが…
リンゴは違う
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 50.06%;top: 6.19%;width: 13.96%;height: 14.25%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
彼女達は
挙動が怪しい
でもリンゴの
死が嘘とも
思えない
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 70.47%;top: 27.82%;width: 11.22%;height: 9.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
ファン
ファン!
詩の専門
ブランディが
お家に来たよ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.52%;top: 49.19%;width: 13.13%;height: 9.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: bold;

text:
ブギウギの
時間よ
マニア共!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.37%;top: 74.42%;width: 10.98%;height: 8.21%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: bold;

text:
悪いけど
ふざけてる場合
じゃないの。
リンゴが
死んだの
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 42.78%;top: 64.78%;width: 14.92%;height: 8.05%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 56.38%;top: 67.97%;width: 9.79%;height: 5.87%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
イヤーーーッ!
リンゴーーー!
なんで!?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 70.70%;top: 66.79%;width: 17.66%;height: 5.87%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: bold;
